item.description:
What You’ll experience in this class:

    • Simple Qi Gong movements for health and vitality and to release stress and anxiety
    • Breathwork - Specific way of breathing to "feed" your body with pure Qi (prana, life force energy), open your inner blockages, and release stagnation on a cellular level; to clear your mind and let go off old past memories that keep you from healing and moving forward in life
    • Relaxation
    • Delicious tea and more energy!

 

Get to know the power of  your body and mind through Qi Gong!

Energize and cleanse your body through the art of natural breathing!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Qi Gong is an ancient, healing Chinese practice that is often called Chinese yoga or moving meditation.

Qi Gong movements provide an excellent stretch for every limb,  awaken your brain, clarify your mind,  and stimulate the energy flow throughout the entire body, but in a gentle, caring way.  This practice is a good choice if you are feeling sad or depressed, or at any time you want to open yourself up to a flow of positive energy.  It is a great way to release stress and recharge yourself with a smile.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Breathwork is a highly personal, experiential process that uses breathing techniques to clear out physical, mental and emotional blocks or stresses.

When we use the breath to create the altered state, we let go of the dictates of the mind creating space for the natural healing process. As our defenses drop, this process works quickly and efficiently in the way that is ideal for the individual.

Friday, April 12th 6:30pm - 9:00pm

Please wear loose clothes, and have your dinner at least 30 mins before class.

See you soon!
item.name: Detoxify Your Body with Qi Gong and Deep Breathing
